mapper.select: SELECT table_no, col_id, col_nm,data_type,col_length,col_isnullable,col_ispk,col_order FROM "COLUMN" WHERE table_no = #{tableNo} ORDER BY col_order

SELECT c.table_no, c.col_id, c.col_nm, c.data_type, c.col_length, c.col_isnullable, c.col_ispk, c.col_order FROM "COLUMN" c JOIN tables t ON c.table_no = t.table_no WHERE c.table_no = #{tableNo} AND t.schema_nm = #{schemaName}
SELECT col_id, col_nm,data_type,col_length,col_isnullable,col_ispk FROM apply_col WHERE apply_no = #{applyNo} ORDER BY col_order
